SEARCH
Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http.file

Class FileHTTPConnection

java.lang.Object
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.Connection
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.LineBasedConnection
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http.HTTPConnection
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http.file.FileHTTPConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChannelHandler, H2FrameHandler
public class FileHTTPConnection extends HTTPConnection
HTTP connection that serves files from a filesystem root. Uses the FileHandlerFactory to create handlers for each request.
Author:
Chris Burdess
